trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Charlevoix
There were no other sightings in Charlevoix on or around November 10th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsTwo white lights shining down from the clouds like headlights but much much larger. We were driving from Petoskey to East Jordan and we saw this in Charlevoix on our left. One was higher and larger than the other with no color but they were close together. They were there brightly and remained for about 10 seconds then disappeared. My husband asked if I had seen what he seen and we were both puzzled. The light was shining down...not up and the weather was cloudy and sleeting and snowing.
